title: Chandigarh health dept fixes Covid-19 treatment rates for private hospitals
description: CHANDIGARH: The Chandigarh Health Department has fixed Covid-19 treatment charges in private hospitals in the city.

title: Ex-engineer sets up 3 oxygen plants in Chandigarh
description: Chandigarh has no shortage of oxygen with a former engineer installing three plants voluntarily, its Advisor Manoj Parida said on Tuesday.

title: ‘1.8L recovered in home isolation’ | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: Chandigarh: In a consoling aspect in devastating situation, 1,80,461 Covid-19 patients who kept under home isolation (HI) have successfully recovered .

title: 98 fatalities, 6,318 infected in Punjab | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: Chandigarh: Punjab reported 98 deaths and 6,318 new Covid-19 cases on Monday.

title: Panchkula: BJP launches Covid-19 helpline, without number
description: The BJP Panchkula has set up a medical helpline. It will be manned by a team of 18 workers, who will work the phone lines from 8:00 am to 10:00 pm. The party, however, did not give any number for the helpline.

title: Open to lockdown, but only if Mohali, Panchkula agree: Chandigarh
description: Calls all-party meeting to discuss Covid-19 situation today Dushyant Singh PundirTribune News ServiceChandigarh, April 26

title: Covid hits Sports Department’s plans
description: Decision on opening of state-run academies, annual championships put on hold Deepankar ShardaTribune News ServiceChandigarh, April 26

title: At containment zone, Covid waste is not separated | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: Mohali: Garbage from houses of Covid-19 patients is not being lifted according to norms in Dhakoli containment zone.

title: Will help dispose Covid waste during emergency: Hry | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: Chandigarh: The Haryana State Pollution Control Board has agreed to help the city in disposal of Covid-19 related biomedical waste if an emergency sit.

title: Covid surge: Hospitals stretched to the limit in Chandigarh
description: PGIMER has only been able to push the capacity of ICUs from 45 last year to 72, while GMCH-32 has been able to add 24 more beds to the 49-bed facility

title: Covid claims record 18 lives in Chandigarh tricity
description: Tricity hits all-time high with Mohali again registering record 11 deaths; 2,000+ fresh cases reported fourth time in five days

title: Chandigarh wants residents to set up 'micro Covid centres' with beds & medical aid amid surge
description: Chandigarh administration has appealed to lawyers, accountants & traders among others to set up these micro Covid facilities in community centres of residential areas.

title: Punjab Night Curfew: Punjab govt orders weekend lockdown, extends night curfew by two hours | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: ​​​"All shops will remain open till 5pm," said Punjab Congress chief Sunil Jakhar addressing mediapersons after a cabinet meeting here on Monday.

title: Professional groups in Chandigarh should set up Covid-19 care centers: IAS Adviser
description: The Covid-19 centers in Chandigarh, with 10 or more beds for the members of the various associations, would be run under the supervision of available health workers from private or government hospitals.

title: Two die, 749 contract virus in Chandigarh
description: Chandigarh: The city recorded 749 Covid-19 cases on Sunday, taking the number of active cases to 5,236. With two more deaths, the toll has reached 435. The UT tally stands at 38,692. A total of 413 patients have been cured of the disease.TNS

title: Only 15 ICU beds available in Chandigarh
description: The government and private hospitals serving severely ill Covid-19 patients have only 15 intensive care unit (ICU) beds available as on Sunday.

title: Court allows Chandigarh cops to give Remidesivir to health department
description: These injections were part of the illegal consignment seized from a pharmaceutical company in Baddi last week.

title: 76 Covid deaths, 7,014 new cases in Punjab | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: Chandigarh: Punjab recorded 76 deaths due to Covid-19 on Sunday and 7,014 new cases.

description: As many as 2,010 people tested positive for the virus on Sunday; 893 in Mohali, 749 in Chandigarh and 368 in Panchkula

title: Covid surge: Chandigarh MC increases contact tracing staff to 100
description: Rapidly increasing coronavirus cases prompt Chandigarh municipal corporation to deploy more staff; teams also increased from 18 to 25

title: Chandigarh: After seizing 3,000 Remdesivir injections, cops struggle to find lab to check its authenticity
description: The Chandigarh Administration intends to use the seized stock - a case property - for treatment of Covid-19 patients in the city after its forensic examinsation to rule out any duplicity.

title: 711 new infections in Chandigarh, three deaths
description: Of 56 ICU beds at PGI, including ventilator beds, 55 are occupied.

title: Chandigarh adopts three-pronged strategy to deal with Covid
description: Intensifies testing, micro-containment & vaccination The UT Administration has adopted a three-pronged strategy to check the rapid spread of coronavirus in the city. With 711 new Covid cases, the UT now has a total of 4,902 active cases.

title: Positivity rate 19%, shortage of antiviral drugs in Chandigarh | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: Even as Covid-19 positivity rate has reached 19% — 711 people tested positive on Saturday — antiviral drugs Remdesivir and Tocilizumab prescribed in

title: Limited oxygen supply choking private hospitals in Chandigarh
description: At least three private hospitals in the city, which have around 60 to 70 Covid-19 patients from the region, have stated their helplessness in getting adequate oxygen with private suppliers unable to meet the required capacity.

title: Covid-19 patient dies as cars collide near Sector 8 | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: Chandigarh: A 35-year-old-man was killed and his two cousins injured in a collision between two cars at the light point of sector 8-9-17-18 on Thursda.

title: Mohali records 920 new Covid-19 cases, 5 deaths | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: Mohali: The coronavirus outburst continues to spread its tentacles in Mohali as the district reported another highest single-day surge with 920 people.

title: Vaccine for 18+: Chandigarh awaits common policy on rates
description: UT adviser Manoj Parida said directions have been sought from the Centre and pricing will be done based on the government’s policy

title: Chandigarh reports record 828 new COVID-19 infections
description: Three deaths take fatality count to 430 Chandigarh recorded 828 new COVID-19 cases in the last 24 hours, a health bulletin from the UT administration showed on Friday—the highest the union territory has reported since it saw its first case in March last year.

title: In report to HC, Chandigarh admin says 3 PSA oxygen generators to be functional in 2 days
description: In a status report filed in Punjab and Haryana High Court regarding the Covid-19 situation and its management, the Chandigarh administration has submitted that the trial for three PSA oxygen generators is complete and they will be functional within two days. The status report has been submitted by the Director Health Services, Dr Amandeep Kang, […]

title: JJP shuts party office in Chandigarh for 2 weeks over Covid-19 situation
description: JJP's Haryana unit chief Nishan Singh said some staff of the deputy CM and employees at the JJP office had contracted the disease.

title: ‘In Chandigarh, 21 to 30 years age group most affected’

title: Covid-19: Total lockdown in Chandigarh today

title: Chandigarh reports new high; records 625 new COVID cases
description: UT has 3,625 active cases Chandigarh recorded 625 new coronavirus cases on Sunday, a health bulletin showed—the highest number of infections the union territory has recorded in 24 hours since the pandemic first began last March.

title: Chandigarh may face stricter curbs if Covid surge continues | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: If the spike in Covid-19 cases continues, be prepared for stricter restrictions. The warning came from UT adviser Manoj Parida on Sunday.

title: Chandigarh hits a new high with 481 fresh Covid-19 cases
description: 29 deaths reported in two weeks this month; positivity rate at 14% In what could be called as worrisome state of affairs, the city today broke all previous records of single-day spike with 481 cases of Covid-19.

title: 481 more test positive in Chandigarh, 3,423 cases active
description: The city has tested a total of 3,55,840 samples, including 3,025 samples tested for Covid-19 on Friday.

title: Chandigarh tricity area hits record high of 1,587 Covid-19 cases
description: Mohali and Panchkula touch all-time high of 860 and 315 cases, respectively; Chandigarh saw a slight dip in its 24-hour Covid count, with 412 cases against Wednesday’s 421
